args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

variable {α : Type _} [TopologicalSpace α]

theorem pugh_exercise_2_92 (K : ℕ → Set α)
  (h_comp : ∀ n, IsCompact (K n))
  (h_ne : ∀ n, (K n).Nonempty)
  (h_mono : ∀ n, K (n+1) ⊆ K n) : ({ x | ∀ n, x ∈ K n }).Nonempty := by sorry
